content: I have a run-make test that only makes sense to run on i686-pc-windows-{msvc,gnu} targets. What test headers should I put into its makefile to achieve this? I've tried # only-i686-pc-windows, but that doesn't work; the test doesn't run on any target. Using two separate test headers, # only-i686 and # only-windows, also doesn't work; the test doesn't run on any target again.
The two separate headers should work. Maybe instrument make_test_description in compiletest and see why it is being ignored?
Sorry for delayed response; this got buried. Turns out it should be # only-x86, not # only-i686.
